1123316843249270784.text: "I think we're underestimating the people who want to hold assets themselves," @paul_l_chou says #DTCCfintech

1123326714585784322.text: .@neha is using BitTorrent as an example, noting that it gave rise to Netflix and other services. A similar change is happening now with bitcoin #DTCCfintech

1123319170765082625.text: Loeffler says, in light of the bear market, she thinks it was encouraging to see a) they could still raise an investment round and b) receive feedback on @Bakkt's proposed plans #DTCCfintech

1123316791185424386.text: "I think it's been thematic that the average person is not well-suited to handle keys from a technical point of view ... but part of the beauty of bitcoin is people can store money in ways that they want, that we can't even touch," @paul_l_chou says. #DTCCfintech

1123329012401680386.text: Some common criticisms of blockchain: it doesn't scale, is too public, and cannot be controlled, @neha says #DTCCfintech

1123404099251265536.text: NEW: A judge, referencing Tether's lawyers' affidavits, has ordered NYAG to show cause why its initial order shouldn't be vacated or modified. Deadline May 6.https://twitter.com/coindesk/status/1123402845691293697 …

1123330069806637056.text: The Lightning Network is one example of @neha's first point; zero-knowledge proofs are how devs can build point 2 #DTCCfintech

1123317430699343878.text: In most commodity industries there's a lot of analysis that happens on the supply side, McElrath says. Mining is the supply side for bitcoin, and there needs to be more analysis of this area #DTCCfintech

1113817566898728960.text: NEW(ish) by me: Yesterday the @SEC_News published a new DLT framework explaining how the agency is applying the Howey test to digital assets. I spoke to more than half a dozen legal experts and advocates on the implications for @coindesk:http://bit.ly/2UhLsRs

1123320749660540930.text: .@JenniferPeve now asking the panelists how they're approaching non-bitcoin cryptos #dtccfintech

1123327591115571201.text: Blockchain has become an umbrella term for a number of technologies, @neha says #DTCCfintech

1123316089247678469.text: Some developers are more interested in building on ethereum on their own "for a few $ETH under the table" than they are in working for major institutions, McElrath says #DTCCfintech

1123389449063358465.text: It's hard to believe that just published this morning but yes indeed this just published this morninghttps://twitter.com/coindesk/status/1123182353449410560 …

1123321385722548224.text: Loeffler says she'd like to see traditional asset managers get more involved in the space #DTCCfintech

1123325813603041280.text: Bitcoin's goal is stated in the beginning of its white paper: a decentralized payment system, @neha says in the closing keynote at #DTCCfintech

1123317200067158016.text: Loeffler says the crypto space now feels like the wild wild west, similarly to other commodity markets when @ICE_Markets was formed: "Bitcoin is a commodity" #DTCCfintech

1123326410905542659.text: . @neha believes that the future is one that will have a layer for transactions, a layer for smart contracts, etc, but she doesn't know if that will use bitcoin or something else #DTCCfintech
